name: Biker Scout Gear
Lore: 'Standard-issue equipment for Imperial biker scouts. Adds electromagnetic vision enhancement visor and boosted comlink. Protects with lightweight head and upper body armor.',
Text: 'Deploy on your side of table. Biker scouts have armor = 3 and are immune to Scramble. Also, Scout Blaster, Comlink, DH-17 blaster and Blaster Rack deploy for free and are destiny +2 when drawn for weapon or battle destiny (Immune to Alter.)',
